MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 6.52PM in the LL59 postcode area of Menai Bridge following reports of a grounded overhead line. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely possible by 9.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.55PM on 29th November 2020.
